# SyncFromGit (Âêâ‰ªñÂ∫ìÂ∫ì)

Plugin ID: `sync-from-git`
Links: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/AndersHsueh/SyncFromGit) or [<button id=HH>Open in Obsidian</button>](obsidian://show-plugin?id=sync-from-git)
Developed by: [[AndersHsueh]]
Mobile compatible: [[Mobile-compatible plugins|No]]

A powerful Obsidian plugin for syncing your vault via Git, enabling seamless synchronization across multiple devices.

## Features

- **Git Repository Sync**: Configure remote Git repository URL and sync with one click
- **File-level Sync**: Right-click files or folders to commit directly to Git
- **Repository Management**: Clone remote Git repositories to your local vault
- **Multi-device Support**: Use Git as a remote "cloud storage" for cross-device sync
- **Status Bar Display**: Real-time sync status indicator (‚ö™ ready, üîÑ syncing, ‚úÖ success, ‚ùå error)
